QuestData.Title: It Goes to 11...
QuestData.Description: We must strike while the vrykul forces are in disarray! Take the harpoon control mechanism to Nifflevar and locate the northernmost harpoon building on the bluff side of the village.$B$BOnce there, commandeer one of the vrykul harpoon guns that are stationed on the building's deck. Use the harpoon gun to rain hell upon Wyrmskull Village! Destroy the longhouse, dockhouse, storage facility and any defenders that the vrykul may send at you!$B$BDo this and Daggercap Bay will become a much safer port!
QuestData.LogDescription: Lieutenant Icehammer in the Howling Fjord wants you to destroy the Dragonflayer Longhouse, Dragonflayer Dockhouse, Dragonflayer Storage Facility and 8 Dragonflayer Defenders.$B$BReturn the Harpoon Control Mechanism to him once the task is complete.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $n! You took out a good chunk of their dragon riders and really pissed off their leadership.$B$BAre you ready to head back to Valgarde and report the good news to Zorek? If so, I've got a crazy idea!
